Note.text: Resort fee per room per night payable at hotel
Please note a minimum age requirement applies to most US hotels. In many hotels the primary guest must be at least 21 years of age on the day of check-in.

Car park NO. Check-in hour - .Please note that guest may pay extra taxes on spot which are not included in the price. Breakfast included up to 2 adults sharing the same room. Extra guests staying in this room must pay their breakfast at the hotel.

CancellationPolicy.text: Please note that this room is non-refundable and non-amendable. If the booking is cancelled, no money will be refunded.
